name: Crowd Bomber
description:
Crowd Bomber is an Android cool game where you have to infect all the characters in the Scene to win. This game is a copy from a game called Crowd Bomber which has been made by VooDoo's studio.
You can download the full project from Github for free if you want to improve it.
https://github.com/fruitsgame-account/CrowdBomber

My linked in profile:

https://www.linkedin.com/in/zaher-ha/

Credits: 

Music from https://www.epidemicsound.com
Designs from: https://kenney.nl
Sound effects from: https://www.zapsplat.com
